title: "RoadProof’s Mission to Make Roads Safer Just Got Closer with OVER 1 Million AI-flagged Traffic Incidents Databased"
excerpt: "RoadProof has reached a significant milestone of over 1 million AI-flagged incidents in its national database providing real-time traffic camera footage and weather information. The company’s innovative data solutions are designed to instantly detect roadway incidents and then preserve critical evidence needed to support those involved in severe car accidents as well as first responders,"
